Description: LTD ESP H-202 Electric Guitar. Green Flame Top. Factory Shred Monster out of box. These H-202's have been one of my favorite players ever since they came out. Right out of the box with Duncan Designed humbuckers and the neck-frets, a metal monster. Have owned several and all were great. Now I need to thin the heard and free up some space.From ESP-LTD,LTD`s H series of solid-bodied electric guitars is made primarily for the younger players who seek a classic metal guitar with a modern edge. H models provide the classic double-cut bodies and classic construction, along with the modern tone and supreme comfort and playability. H-202 is a lower intermediate class option with all of the class standard features and an elegant carved top. Flamed maple top is combined with a solid mahogany body and is bound in white. H-202 is available only in See-Thru Red with gloss finish and chrome-plated hardware. Duncan Designed HB-102 set of active humbucking pickups (master volume, master tone and a three-position blade switch), bolted maple neck, die cast tuners and a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard make up the rest of the core specs. Title: LTD ESP H-202 Electric Guitar. Green Flame Top. Factory Shred Monster out of box
ConditionDescription: Other than a crappy paint job on the back and some on the sides, plays perfect and sounds awesome.
